00011 // glass.cpp*
00012 #include "pbrt.h"
00013 #include "material.h"
00014 // Glass Class Declarations
00015 class Glass : public Material {
00016 public:
00017         // Glass Public Methods
00018         Glass(Reference<Texture<Spectrum> > r, Reference<Texture<Spectrum> > t,
00019                         Reference<Texture<float> > i, Reference<Texture<float> > bump) {
00020                 Kr = r;
00021                 Kt = t;
00022                 index = i;
00023                 bumpMap = bump;
00024         }
00025         BSDF *GetBSDF(const DifferentialGeometry &dgGeom, const DifferentialGeometry &dgShading) const;
00026 private:
00027         // Glass Private Data
00028         Reference<Texture<Spectrum> > Kr, Kt;
00029         Reference<Texture<float> > index;
00030         Reference<Texture<float> > bumpMap;
00031 };
00032 // Glass Method Definitions
00033 BSDF *Glass::GetBSDF(const DifferentialGeometry &dgGeom, const DifferentialGeometry &dgShading) const {
00034         // Allocate _BSDF_, possibly doing bump-mapping with _bumpMap_
00035         DifferentialGeometry dgs;
00036         if (bumpMap)
00037                 Bump(bumpMap, dgGeom, dgShading, &dgs);
00038         else
00039                 dgs = dgShading;
00040         BSDF *bsdf = BSDF_ALLOC(BSDF)(dgs, dgGeom.nn);
00041         Spectrum R = Kr->Evaluate(dgs).Clamp();
00042         Spectrum T = Kt->Evaluate(dgs).Clamp();
00043         float ior = index->Evaluate(dgs);
00044         if (!R.Black())
00045                 bsdf->Add(BSDF_ALLOC(SpecularReflection)(R,
00046                         BSDF_ALLOC(FresnelDielectric)(1., ior)));
00047         if (!T.Black())
00048                 bsdf->Add(BSDF_ALLOC(SpecularTransmission)(T, 1., ior));
00049         return bsdf;
00050 }
00051 extern "C" DLLEXPORT Material * CreateMaterial(const Transform &xform,
00052                 const TextureParams &mp) {
00053         Reference<Texture<Spectrum> > Kr = mp.GetSpectrumTexture("Kr", Spectrum(1.f));
00054         Reference<Texture<Spectrum> > Kt = mp.GetSpectrumTexture("Kt", Spectrum(1.f));
00055         Reference<Texture<float> > index = mp.GetFloatTexture("index", 1.5f);
00056         Reference<Texture<float> > bumpMap = mp.GetFloatTexture("bumpmap", 0.f);
00057         return new Glass(Kr, Kt, index, bumpMap);
00058 }
